title: Mystery at the Mansion
story: Last night, a murder took place at the luxurious Darkwood Mansion.
The victim, Mr. Jameson, was the owner of the mansion and a highly successful businessman.
The police have identified three main suspects, each with their own motives to kill Mr. Jameson.

suspect.name: Mark Thompson
suspect.alibi: Mark claims to have been at a charity event during the time of the murder.
suspect.confirmation: However, there are no witnesses to support his alibi.

witness.name: Emma Moore
witness.observation: Emma saw a tall man wearing a black coat leaving the mansion around midnight.
witness.description: She mentions that the man had grayish hair and a scar on his left cheek.

npcs.name: Butler
npcs.dialogue: I saw Mr. Thompson arguing with Mr. Jameson a few days ago. They seemed really upset.

npcs.name: Maid
npcs.dialogue: I overheard Ms. Johnson, a close friend of Mr. Jameson, threatening him on the phone yesterday.

clues.Front Door: The doormat near the front entrance is soaked, indicating that it had been raining.
clues.Library Door: The library door is slightly ajar, suggesting someone had recently entered or exited.
clues.Kitchen Door: There are fresh footprints near the kitchen door, as if someone had entered or left in a hurry.
clues.Lobby: On the lobby table, there is an unopened envelope addressed to Mr. Jameson, potentially containing valuable information.
